Introduction

Kyu (formerly Daniel) is a South Korean-American singer under NAISU Agency. He debuted as a soloist on March 26, 2025, with the single "Tempo." Before his debut, he trained under PLEDIS Entertainment and gained recognition as a contestant on the survival show I-LAND.

He initially debuted under the name Daniel with the digital single "ISOLATED" on June 22, 2024, before rebranding as Kyu in 2025.
